com.example.crowdtrials

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.crowdtrials.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an interface for the database.

                              java.lang.String experimentName)
        This class updates the database with the results.
        Parameters:
        result - This is the result of the updating the database - success if it successfully updated and failure, if the update failed

        answer - This is the answer String to be entered.
